contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Olympics Zimbabwe |games=1996 Summer |competitors=13 (12 men and 1 woman) |sports=6 |flagbearer=[[Tendai Chimusasa]] |officials= }} '''[[Zimbabwe]]''' competed at the '''[[1996 Summer Olympics]]''' in [[Atlanta, Georgia|Atlanta]], [[United States]]. ==Results by event== ===[[Athletics at the 1996 Summer Olympics|Athletics]]=== '''Men's 4x400m Relay''' * [[Julius Masvanise]], [[Tawanda Chiwira]], [[Savieri Ngidhi]], and [[Ken Harnden]] :* Heat — 3:13.35 (→ did not advance) '''Men's 400m Hurdles''' *[[Ken Harnden]] :* Heat — 48.54s :* Semi Final — 48.61s (→ did not advance) *[[Julius Masvanise]] :* Heat — 50.16s (→ did not advance) '''Men's Marathon''' * [[Tendai Chimusasa]] — 2:16.31 (→ 13th place) '''Men's Triple Jump''' * [[Ndabazinhle Mdhlongwa]] ===[[Boxing at the 1980 Summer Olympics|Boxing]]=== '''Men's Flyweight (– 51 kg)''' *[[Arson Mapfumo]] :* First Round — Lost to [[Elias Recaido]] (Philippines), 2-13 '''Men's Light Middleweight (– 71 kg)''' *[[Alexander Kwangwald]] :* First Round — Lost to [[Hendrik Simangunsong]] (Indonesia), 1-12 ===[[Cycling at the 1996 Summer Olympics|Cycling]]=== '''Men's Individual Road Race''' *[[Timothy Jones (cyclist)|Timothy Jones]] :* Final — did not finish (→ no ranking) ===[[Diving at the 1996 Summer Olympics|Diving]]=== '''Men's 3m Springboard''' *[[Evan Stewart]] :* Preliminary Heat — 361.53 :* Semi Final — 206.43 (→ did not advance, 13th place) ===[[Swimming at the 1996 Summer Olympics|Swimming]]=== '''Women's 100m Freestyle''' * [[Teresa Moodie]] :* Heat — 58.59 (→ did not advance, 39th place) ===[[Tennis at the 1996 Summer Olympics|Tennis]]=== '''Men's Singles * [[Byron Black]] * [[Wayne Black]] '''Men's Doubles * [[Byron Black]] and [[Wayne Black]] ==References== *[http://www.la84foundation.org/5va/reports_frmst.htm Official Olympic Reports] *[http://www.sports-reference.com/olympics/countries/ZIM/summer/1996/ sports-reference] {{NOCin1996SummerOlympics}}
